DOC.brief_summary: Acute kidney injury ( AKI ) common complication critical care patient . Currently parameters available early prognosis AKI . Macrophage migration inhibitory factor ( MIF ) associate AKI clinical study . The aim study evaluate time course MIF concentration patient AKI .
DOC.criteria: Age < 18 year > 80 year Patients chronic dialysis Patients continuous hemodialysis , hemofiltration hemodiafiltration within 4 week prior study Patients expect length ICU stay shorter 3 day Patients low probability survive first 2 day ICU admission Pregnancy nursing
